title: HEXEN 95 Original Windows Port + Win XP and above compatibility
description:
Thank you for downloading my torrent and please SEED.

In order to make it work on Windows XP/7/8 etc, do the steps below:
1. Extract the folder wherever you want.
2. In the folder, right click on "HEXEN.exe".
3. Go to the "Compatibility" tab and select the following options:
- Run in 256 colors
- Run in 640x480 resolution
- Set the compatibility settings to Windows 95.
4. Click Apply, OK, and right click on "HLAUNCH.exe".
5. Go to the "Compatibility" tab and set the compatibility settings to Windows 95.
6. Click Apply, OK, and right click on "HEXRUN.exe".
7. Go to the "Compatibility" tab and set the compatibility settings to Windows 95.
8. Click Apply, OK, and make a shortcut of HEXRUN.exe on your desktop if you want.

For a video tutorial, please check out this tutorial by a awesome dude (includes additional recommended settings):

Done! Now you can play the game as you liked to in the good ol' days. :)

Share this torrent around so people can find this easily rather than struggling with downloading Towers of Darkness and such.

If you have any questions leave a comment below.

AND PLEASE SEED
